structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The legislative body of each city of the first class is hereby empowered and authorized to pass such ordinances and provide such appropriations as are necessary to effectuate the purposes of KRS 90.110 to 90.230.
law.history: Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 164, sec. 2, effective June 17, 1954. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 16, sec. 11.
